examples.title: Create A DisplayObject
examples.code: var canvas = new Canvas(); canvas.build(); canvas.width(500); canvas.height(500); document.body.appendChild(canvas.element); var dp = new CanvasDisplayObject(); dp.build(); dp.style.width(20); dp.style.height(20); dp.style.x(20); dp.style.y(20); dp.id="d1"; dp.style.backgroundColor("#f00"); canvas.appendChild(dp);
